title: Yukon - Charley Rivers National Preserve: Birds
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals     Birds                 Birds        Male Barrow's Goldeneye on the Charley River NPS Photo by Josh Spice       Learn more about one of Yukon-Charley Rivers' significant aspects by visiting the Peregrine Falcon page. Check out the Bird Species & Distributions in Yukon-Charley Rivers report to learn about which species of birds live in each region and habitat type of Yukon-Charley Rivers National Preserve. Also of scientific interest in the Preserve are passerines and ptarmigan. Follow the links to learn more!        Bald eagles are common sightings in Yukon-Charley Rivers, where they often perch on log jams on the shoreline of the Yukon River. NPS Photo by Josh Spice
